title: House of knowledge
creator_credit: RKO Pathe Pictures and Larry O'Reilly
brief_description: A panoramic study of the Smithsonian Institution, which supplies its immense collection of art and museum pieces largely by its own exploration and searching. Mentions briefly ethnology, biology, entomology and other sciences - giving glimpses of work in each field. Shows field teams investigating a new volcano, and archaeologists in Mexico.
